name: Red October 5
description:
A small game made for a small local jam, it took me about 7 hours to make it, and most of the time I spent to implement sonar mechanic (first shader I ever wrote). 

How to play:

WSAD to control the submarine

SPACE to shoot the torpedo

sonar works automatically

The game was made quite a time ago, the sounds I used were downloaded from the internet, and the background I used is from https://opengameart.org/content/underwater-background-1
